title: German chancellor lands in Beijing for inaugural China trip
summary_full: Friedrich Merz said it would be a mistake to "decouple" Germany from China shortly before boarding a plane to Beijing.
summary_public: Friedrich Merz said it would be a mistake to "decouple" Germany from China shortly before boarding a plane to Beijing.

DE.label: neutral
DE.evidence: it would be a mistake to "decouple" Germany from China
